arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) identifier of the KX environment.

availabilityZones.description: AWS Availability Zone IDs that this environment is available in. Important when selecting VPC subnets to use in cluster creation.

createdTimestamp.description: Timestamp at which the environment is created in FinSpace. Value determined as epoch time in seconds. For example, the value for Monday, November 1, 2021 12:00:00 PM UTC is specified as 1635768000.

customDnsConfigurations.description: List of DNS server name and server IP. This is used to set up Route-53 outbound resolvers. Defined below.

infrastructureAccountId.description: Unique identifier for the AWS environment infrastructure account.

kmsKeyId.description:
KMS key ID to encrypt your data in the FinSpace environment.

The following arguments are optional:

lastModifiedTimestamp.description: Last timestamp at which the environment was updated in FinSpace. Value determined as epoch time in seconds. For example, the value for Monday, November 1, 2021 12:00:00 PM UTC is specified as 1635768000.

name.description: Name of the KX environment that you want to create.

tags.description: Key-value mapping of resource tags. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: Map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

transitGatewayConfiguration.description: Transit gateway and network configuration that is used to connect the KX environment to an internal network. Defined below.

customDnsConfigurations.description: List of DNS server name and server IP. This is used to set up Route-53 outbound resolvers. Defined below.

kmsKeyId.description:
KMS key ID to encrypt your data in the FinSpace environment.

The following arguments are optional:

name.description: Name of the KX environment that you want to create.

tags.description: Key-value mapping of resource tags. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

transitGatewayConfiguration.description: Transit gateway and network configuration that is used to connect the KX environment to an internal network. Defined below.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering KxEnvironment resources.
